name: thronging
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
throng
to be or go somewhere in very large numbers: Crowds thronged the market place. The narrow streets were thronged with summer visitors. [ + to infinitive ] Thousands of people thronged to see the exhibition while it was in the capital. Synonym
pack Compare
crowd verb informal
